A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've just arrived home after being out to see this and am still reeling with shock and surprising anger. Yes\, I am an OT fan\, crikey I even enjoyed some of the prequels\, but this is just a flapping mess from start to finish. I really liked Rogue One\, great movie and a great Star Wars feel to it. The Force Awakens bugs me on many levels\, but I still enjoyed about 60 percent of it. The Last Jedi is probably one of the most busiest\, confusing and poorly written movies I have ever had the misfortune of watching and I simply cannot understand any positivity it is receiving from fans and critics. I can only assume that some cash backhanders were received or there is a lot of genuine mental illness at play.
